mapper.sql: select id, report_date, seat_group, seat_num, seat_name, deal_with_consumer_count, action_code_num, call_code_num, call_action_code_recovery, average_call_code, average_action_code, call_len, self_effective_call_code_num, third_effective_call_code_num, average_effective_call_code_num, call_connected_recovery, complaint_num, org_id, org_name, user_cover_num, call_num, connected_call_num, colling_case_money from t_lc_report_day_process
mapper.insert:
insert into t_lc_report_day_process
report_date, seat_group, seat_num, seat_name, deal_with_consumer_count, action_code_num, call_code_num, call_action_code_recovery, average_call_code, average_action_code, call_len, self_effective_call_code_num, third_effective_call_code_num, average_effective_call_code_num, call_connected_recovery, complaint_num, org_id, org_name, user_cover_num, call_num, connected_call_num, colling_case_money,
#{reportDate}, #{seatGroup}, #{seatNum}, #{seatName}, #{dealWithConsumerCount}, #{actionCodeNum}, #{callCodeNum}, #{callActionCodeRecovery}, #{averageCallCode}, #{averageActionCode}, #{callLen}, #{selfEffectiveCallCodeNum}, #{thirdEffectiveCallCodeNum}, #{averageEffectiveCallCodeNum}, #{callConnectedRecovery}, #{complaintNum}, #{orgId}, #{orgName}, #{userCoverNum}, #{callNum}, #{connectedCallNum}, #{collingCaseMoney},
mapper.update:
update t_lc_report_day_process
report_date = #{reportDate}, seat_group = #{seatGroup}, seat_num = #{seatNum}, seat_name = #{seatName}, deal_with_consumer_count = #{dealWithConsumerCount}, action_code_num = #{actionCodeNum}, call_code_num = #{callCodeNum}, call_action_code_recovery = #{callActionCodeRecovery},
average_call_code = #{averageCallCode}, average_action_code = #{averageActionCode},
call_len = #{callLen}, self_effective_call_code_num = #{selfEffectiveCallCodeNum},
third_effective_call_code_num = #{thirdEffectiveCallCodeNum},
average_effective_call_code_num = #{averageEffectiveCallCodeNum},
call_connected_recovery = #{callConnectedRecovery},
complaint_num = #{complaintNum}, org_id = #{orgId}, org_name = #{orgName}, user_cover_num = #{userCoverNum}, call_num = #{callNum}, connected_call_num = #{connectedCallNum}, colling_case_money = #{collingCaseMoney},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from t_lc_report_day_process where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL #{day} DAY)) AS report_date, t.user_group AS seat_group, t.login_name AS seat_num, t.user_name AS seat_name, (SELECT count(1) from t_lc_task ta where ta.owner_id = t.user_id and ta.org_id = #{orgId} and ta.task_status = 2 AND ta.allot_type = 1 AND ta.task_type NOT IN (10, 11, 12, 18, 19) GROUP BY ta.owner_id) as deal_with_consumer_count, (SELECT SUM(ta.arrears_total) from t_lc_task ta where ta.owner_id = t.user_id and ta.org_id = #{orgId} and ta.task_status = 2 AND ta.allot_type = 1 AND ta.task_type NOT IN (10, 11, 12, 18, 19) GROUP BY ta.owner_id) as colling_case_money , (select count(1) from t_lc_task ta where ta.owner_id = t.user_id and ta.org_id = #{orgId} and ta.recently_follow_up_date BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} group by ta.owner_id) as user_cover_num, (select count(1) from t_lc_call_record re where re.create_by = t.user_id and re.org_id = #{orgId} and re.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} and re.type = 1 group by re.create_by) as call_num, (select count(1) from t_lc_call_record re where re.create_by = t.user_id and re.org_id = #{orgId} and re.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} group by re.create_by) as call_code_num, (SELECT count(1) AS third_effective_call_code_num FROM t_lc_call_record re WHERE re.create_by = t.user_id and re.org_id = #{orgId} AND EXISTS (SELECT cc.call_code FROM t_lc_call_code cc where cc.is_valid = 1 AND re.call_sign = cc.call_code) AND re.contact_relation = 1 and re.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY re.create_by) as self_effective_call_code_num, (SELECT count(1) AS third_effective_call_code_num FROM t_lc_call_record re WHERE re.create_by = t.user_id and re.org_id = #{orgId} AND EXISTS (SELECT cc.call_code FROM t_lc_call_code cc where cc.is_valid = 1 AND re.call_sign = cc.call_code) AND re.contact_relation != 1 and re.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY re.create_by) as third_effective_call_code_num, (SELECT count(1) AS complaint_num FROM t_lc_call_record re WHERE re.create_by = t.user_id and re.action_code = 'TS-投诉' and re.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} AND re.org_id = #{orgId} GROUP BY re.create_by) as complaint_num, (SELECT count(1) from t_lc_call_record re where re.create_by = t.user_id and re.org_id = #{orgId} and re.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} and re.call_radio_location IS NOT NULL and re.call_radio_location != '' and re.call_len is not null and re.call_len != '' GROUP BY re.create_by) as connected_call_num, (SELECT SUM(re.call_len)/ 1000 / 60 from t_lc_call_record re where re.create_by = t.user_id and re.org_id = #{orgId} and re.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} and re.call_radio_location IS NOT NULL and re.call_radio_location != '' and re.call_len is not null and re.call_len != '' GROUP BY re.create_by) as call_len from (select su.user_id,su.user_group,su.login_name,su.user_name from t_lc_call_record re, sys_user su where re.create_by = su.user_id and re.org_id = #{orgId} and re.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} and su.user_group = #{userGroup} GROUP BY re.create_by) t

SELECT count(1) as deal_with_consumer_count from t_lc_task where allot_type = 1 AND task_status = 2
AND recently_follow_up_date >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND recently_follow_up_date <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND owner_id=#{createBy}
select sum(arrears_total)amount_due_sum,sum(dqyhje)as amount_actual_sum from t_lc_task where owner_id=${userId} and task_status=2
select sum(b.too) as amount_actual_sum from (select max(arrears_total) as too,case_no from t_lc_task where owner_id = ${userId} GROUP BY case_no) b

select sum(a.hkje) as amount_due_sum from cur_assets_repayment_package a,sys_user b where a.owner_name=b.user_name and b.user_id=${userId} and a.hkrq >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and a.hkrq <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
